fwp

Fast Web Pages. Create your own website with zero coding skills that loads in milliseconds.

View App • View Source

fwp/README.md

FWP: Fast Web Pages

fwp allows people to create their own websites by writing text.
It’s meant to be a open-source recreation of txti with many improvements.

Installation

On Glitch:

  • Remix this project. You’re done.

On a Linux PC:

  • Install Node.js and npm.
  • Remix this project.
  • Go to Tools -> Import and Export -> Download Project.
  • Extract the tgz file you’ve just downloaded.
  • Install the dependencies by typing npm i in the terminal.
  • Run the app by executing npm start.

Where is my data stored?

The SQLite database is stored in a hidden directory called .data.
If your fwp instance is located in /app/fwp/, the data directory will be found at /app/fwp/.data/.

Backups

All you need to backup your instance is copy a file called db.sqlite located in the data directory.
When restoring your instance, just copy the file back to where it originally was located.
